content: I’m an assistant researcher at the software engineering group (SEG) in Nanjing University. My research interests lie in software testing and program language, including static and dynamic analysis. Recently, I focus on improving the performance of program analysis by machine learning.
summary: I’m an assistant researcher at the software engineering group (SEG) in Nanjing University. My research interests lie in software testing and program language, including static and dynamic analysis. Recently, I focus on improving the performance of program analysis by machine learning.
title: Yu WANG

title: Dangdone: Eliminating dangling pointers via intermediate pointers
